page.shortlink: api star html to bin function

argument.name: RTF_Binary_Text
argument.description: Binary formatted RTF text as it exists in a RTF memo field.

page.discussion: The *HTML_TO_BIN() function converts HTML text to its equivalent binary RTF memo format.
page.example: dim html_text as C dim rtf_bin as B dim tbl as P html_text = file.to_string("c:\rtf_test.htm") html_text = extract_string(html_text,"") html_text = right(html_text, len(html_text)-1) ? html_text = George lived on top of a mountain. rtf_bin = *html_to_bin(html_text) tbl = table.open("customer") tbl.fetch_first() tbl.change_begin(.t.) tbl.Rtfmemo = rtf_bin tbl.change_end(.t.) tbl.close()
